statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -11 \\ -10 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 22 \\ 31 \\ 26 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 13 \\ 11 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
